options.label: Checkbox C. Mixed straddle account election
Checkbox D. Net section 1256 contracts loss election

fields.name: txtLn1AccountIdent_1
fields.title: Part I. Section 1256 Contracts Marked to Market. Line 1(a). Identification of account

fields.name: txtLn1GainLoss_1
fields.title: Gain or Loss. Use '-' for loss value

fields.name: txtLn1AccountIdent_2
fields.title: Line 1(a). Identification of account

fields.title: Gain or Loss. Use '-' for loss value

fields.name: txtLn2aTotLoss
fields.title: Line 2(a). This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn2bTotLoss
fields.title: Line 2(b). This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn3NetGainLoss
fields.title: Line 3. Net gain or (loss). Combine line 2, columns (b) and (c). This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn41099bAdjustment
fields.title: Line 4. Form 1099-B adjustments. See instructions and attach statement

fields.name: txtLn5CombineLn3Ln4
fields.title: Line 5. Combine lines 3 and 4. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn6Net1256Loss
fields.title: Line 6. If you have a net section 1256 contracts loss and checked box D above, enter the amount of loss toback. Enter the loss as a positive number. If you didn't check box D, enter zero

fields.name: txtLn7CombineLn5Ln6
fields.title: Line 7. Combine lines 5 and 6. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn8ShortTermGainLoss
fields.title: Line 8. Short-term capital gain or (loss). Multiply line 7 by 40% (0. 40). Enter here and include on line 4 of Schedule D or on Form 8949. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn9LongTermGainLoss
fields.title: Line 9. Long-term capital gain or (loss). Multiply line 7 by 60% (0. 60). Enter here and include on line 11 of Schedule D or on Form 8949. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn10aPropDesc_1
fields.title: Part II. Gains and Losses From Straddles. Section A-Losses From Straddles. Line 10(a). Description of property

fields.name: txtLn10bDateEntered_1
fields.title: Line 10(b). Date entered into or acquired. (2 digit month, 2 digit day and 4 digit year)

fields.name: txtLn10cDateClosed_1
fields.title: Line 10(c). Date closed out or sold. (2 digit month, 2 digit day and 4 digit year)

fields.name: txtLn10dGrossSalesPrice_1
fields.title: Line 10(d). Gross sales price

fields.name: txtLn10eCostOfSale_1
fields.title: Line 10(e). Cost or other basis plus expense of sale

fields.name: txtLn10fCalDiff_1
fields.title: Line 10(f) Loss. If column (e) is more than (d), enter difference Otherwise, enter -0-. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn10gUnregGain_1
fields.title: Line 10(g). Unrecognized gain on offsetting positions

fields.name: txtLn10hCalDiff_1
fields.title: Line 10(h) Recognized loss. If column (f) is more than (g), enter difference. Otherwise, enter -0-. This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtLn11aShortTermLoss
fields.title: Line 11a. Enter the short-term portion of losses from line 10, column (h), here and include on line 4 of ScheduleD or on Form 8949. See instructions

fields.name: txtLn11bLongTermLoss
fields.title: Line 11b. Enter the long-term portion of losses from line 10, column (h), here and include on line 11 of ScheduleD or on Form 8949. See instructions
